sect2.title: Snap to Bounding Boxes
sect2.para: If this option is enabled, moving e.g. layers will snap it to the bounding box (edge or center) of other layers. This makes it easy to align them horizontally or vertically. Note that this is not restricted to layers, you can also use it with e.g. Paths.

caption.para: This example shows the red layer snapping horizontally to the center of the green layer and vertically to the right edge of the blue layer.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
View Snap to Bounding Boxes .
